title: The Opening Gambit
description: A routine surveillance operation turns into something much more dangerous.

scenes.narrative: You arrive at the stakeout location just as the target emerges from the building. The street is quiet, but something feels off - too quiet. Your informant mentioned unusual activity, but this seems... wrong.

choices.label: Maintain distance and observe. Patience is key in surveillance.
choices.consequence: You hold back, watching from the shadows. The target seems nervous, constantly checking their surroundings.

choices.label: Get closer for a better look. Risk assessment shows acceptable danger.
choices.consequence: You move in closer, using the crowd for cover. The target spots something suspicious and picks up their pace.

choices.label: Call in backup immediately. Better safe than sorry.
choices.consequence: You radio for immediate support. The response team arrives quickly, but the target has already slipped away.

choices.label: Trust your gut - this setup smells like a trap. Abort and regroup.
choices.consequence: You pull back immediately. Moments later, you see figures moving in the shadows - you made the right call.

scenes.narrative: The target leads you to an abandoned warehouse district. Multiple vehicles are parked suspiciously, and you can hear muffled voices from inside one of the buildings.

choices.label: Set up a perimeter and wait for the right moment to move in.
choices.consequence: You establish observation points and wait. The meeting concludes, and the target leaves with documents.

choices.label: Attempt to get closer and listen in on the conversation.
choices.consequence: You manage to get within earshot and overhear critical information about the operation.

choices.label: Call for tactical support and prepare for a raid.
choices.consequence: SWAT teams move in, but the targets scatter. You recover some evidence but lose the main target.

choices.label: This feels like a setup. Pull back and investigate from afar.
choices.consequence: You retreat to a safe distance. The warehouse explodes moments later - another trap avoided.

patterns.description: A street performer suddenly appears, juggling chainsaws while reciting Shakespeare
Pigeons form perfectly synchronized formations spelling out cryptic messages
